# Microsoft Power BI

BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE

Microsoft Power BI is a business analytics service that delivers insights to enable fast, informed decisions. It provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities with an interface simple enough for end users to create their own reports and dashboards. Power BI connects to a wide variety of data sources, offering robust data preparation, data discovery, and interactive reporting.

## Power BI + MotherDuck

Microsoft Power BI integrates with MotherDuck by connecting to the cloud data warehouse capabilities provided by MotherDuck, which is based on DuckDB. This integration allows users to leverage Power BI's powerful visualization and analytics tools to explore and analyze data stored in MotherDuck, ensuring seamless data access and real-time insights.
